text: Zisas mba rɨɨi gumgi gu mbigir kurkurav kav, mbaram wo phorga rui gumgir kamgim, mbe zim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Gu kha gumgi gu mbigi kora muuŋgi. Mbe na phorga kim, ra phuni khegene vhɨzgim, mbe mba ki fhu. Gu thi ndavira mbe sararim, mbe ŋgɨrgeŋ thagi. Gu mbe sararim, mbe ŋgɨp, mbe tuavar thir vhɨzɨv, rɨmgi mbe hiiŋrim, mbe ŋgegɨrga fhuvara.”
